text.section: Every license issued for the operation of a CDL driver training school shall expire on June 30 following the date of the issuance unless revoked or canceled by the commission.
Before July 1 of each year, every CDL driver training school shall apply for renewal of its license. The application shall be on forms prepared and furnished by the commission.
Every license issued to a CDL driver training instructor shall expire on June 30 following the date of the issuance unless revoked or canceled by the commission.
Before July 1 of each year, every CDL driver training instructor shall apply for renewal of his or her license. The application shall be on forms prepared and furnished by the commission.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 17, effective July 12, 2012. -- Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 8, effective April 9, 2002. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 88. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 148. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 5.
